item.title: Publications
item.description: You can check out my research contributions on GoogleScholar, ORCID, or ResearcherID (L-9204-2013). If you cannot access the publications via the provided links, do not hesitate to contact me per email. Peer-reviewed journal articles in press - 2018 - 2017 - 2016 - 2015 - 2014 - pre 2014 - under review in press 28 – Kuemmerle T, Levers C, Bleyhl B, Olech W, Perzanowski K, Reusch C & Kramer-Schadt S (2018).
